price: Maka berjalanlah kamu (kaum musyrikin) di bumi selama empat bulan dan ketahuilah bahwa kamu tidak dapat melemahkan Allah, dan sesungguhnya Allah menghinakan orang-orang kafir.
arabic: فَسِيحُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَرۡبَعَةَ أَشۡهُرٖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّكُمۡ غَيۡرُ مُعۡجِزِي ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡزِي ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fasīḥū fī al-arḍi arbaʿata ashhurin wa-iʿ'lamū annakum ghayru muʿ'jizī al-lahi wa-anna al-laha mukh'zī al-kāfirīna
